transcript.text: What do you think? Are these employees doing enough to keep personal data safe?

contentBackground.img: Employee working with data on laptop

contentText.text: Do you think these employees are adequately protecting personal data?

instructionText.text: Select Yes or No for each option then click on Submit.
Click on Next (bottom right arrow) to continue.

option.text: Throwing away a handout with personal information where others can access it
Grabbing a coffee while waiting for a print job with confidential customer data
Using strong passwords to protect documents containing personal information
Keeping personal data long after required/needed “just in case”

correct.text: Protecting the personal financial and banking information of employees, customers and business partners is vitally important. Follow all of our security measures and never leave personal information in an area where others can see it, even if only for a moment and around others you trust. Properly dispose of information when there is no longer a legitimate need to keep it.

incorrect.text: Protecting the personal financial and banking information of employees, customers and business partners is vitally important. Follow all of our security measures and never leave personal information in an area where others can see it, even if only for a moment and around others you trust.
